ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you received the 2 lenses from the observatories?  If so, how did you get them, they kept telling me to come back in two weeks.
ygData.messageBody:
Have you received the 2 lenses from the observatories? If so, how did you
get them, they kept telling me to come back in two weeks.

At 12:43 PM 07/22/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>While I agree that Verant is sick & twisted, you are confusing two
>quests. The Evil
>Eye is part of the Observer Staff Quest and originates at an Observitory. The
>Telescope Lens Quest orignates in the Wizards? Guild and it requires you
>to get four
>lenses. None of them are on Borxx. Two are given to you by the
>observitories. One
>is obtained by killing a 14ish (and nasty) DE in Freeport, and the last is
>on this
>missing gnome. Please also note that this quest will not be given to
>wizards above
>level 12.
